short_summary: Supply and delivery of one Hi-Rail Pickup Truck
description: Detailed procurement description can be found in attached documents
tags: Composants et systèmes de véhicules spécialisés
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Hi-Rail Pickup Truck

## Solicitation Number and Reference
- **Solicitation Number: 23-58199**
- **Reference Number: cb-810-95637671**

## Tender Details

- **Publication Date:** January 15, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date:** February 12, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 29, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date:** March 29, 2024

## Buying Professional Services

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites proposals for the supply and delivery of one (1) Hi-Rail Pickup Truck. Interested parties are encouraged to submit their proposals according to the tender documents and instructions outlined in the Request for Proposal.

## Tender Documents
The tender documents can be downloaded from [Canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) or obtained upon request.

## Required Delivery and Operation

The successful bidder will be responsible for the delivery of one (1) Hi-Rail Pickup Truck to the NRC, as outlined in the tender documents and instructions.

## Evaluation Criteria
The proposal will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
  - Mandatory evaluation criteria
- The evaluation results will be based on the criteria outlined in the tender documents.

## Contact for Additional Information

- **Annette Driscoll**
- **[annette.driscoll@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:annette.driscoll@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)**
- **(506) 377-9104** (phone)

## Regions of Opportunity
World

## Regions of Delivery
National Capital Region (NCR)

## Procurement Category
 Goods and Services

## Trade Agreements
Refer to the Request for Proposal (RFP) and tender documents for more information on trade agreements. I would not put the language in the write-up, only indicate the language was not translated and make a note to get help for the annotations translation.
